allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Circuit Quest - Educational Arduino Game

Features:
- Interactive breadboard circuit builder
- 5 themed storylines \(Mars Colony, Wild West, Sports, Theater, Medical\)
- Drag-and-drop component placement
- Real-time circuit testing
- Wire connection system
- Story-driven challenges \(5 levels per theme\)
- Responsive landing page with theme selection
- Educational content for high school students

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
